Package index

Read Services

arc_open()
Open connection to remote resource
arc_raster()
Read from an Image Server
arc_read()
Read an ArcGIS FeatureLayer, Table, or ImageServer
arc_select()
Query a Feature Service
get_layer() get_all_layers() get_layers()
Extract a layer from a Feature or Map Server
get_layer_estimates()
Get Estimates
query_layer_attachments() download_attachments()
Query and download attachments

clear_query() list_fields() pull_field_aliases() list_items() refresh_layer()
Utility functions
prepare_spatial_filter() match_spatial_rel()
Prepare JSON for use as a spatial filter based on feature geometry or bounding box input
